page.title: 10INVERECK HOME - INFORMATION.
page.content: Invereck Home has 30 rooms and 33 people can stay at any one time.The building has 4 floors and 3 of them are for the old people.The other floor is for the owners. Each day the people have something to do. On Sunday there is a church service,Monday is Music & Movement, Tuesday and Friday are shopping days in Dunoon, Wednesday is games afternoon for Bowling and Putting and Thursday is Handicrafts. Every week the residents have to pay Â£101.99 to stay there but the Church of Scotland who own the home help to pay some of it. The old people can do what they want eg. to go out for a walk, or some of them go out in the van when the staff go home. The officer in charge has to be trained as a nurse or a social worker.
